channel.title: [PI] Slayer Skill Problems [PI]
channel.description: Ok, i've got the slayer.java and an npc with working dialogues for slayer but when you kill an assigned slayer npc it does not give exp for slayer/decrease the amount in the task. I don't really know how to fix this and I have tried everything, would anyone mind helping me out please?

item.title: [PI] Slayer Skill Problems [PI]
